person.persName: John Wilson (Scioto County, Ohio, attorney and politician.)

body.p: Scioto County, Ohio, attorney and politician. Pennsylvania native. Married to Nancy "Ann" Alexander Wilson in Belmont County, Ohio, on January 28, 1830. Father of James Wilson, Nancy Wilson, Alexander Wilson, Mary Wilson, William Wilson, George Wilson, Henry C. Wilson, Margaret Elizabeth Wilson, Josephine Wilson, Romaine Wilson, and Lydia Viola Wilson. Attorney in Gallia County, Ohio, in 1850. Attorney in Boyd County, Kentucky, in 1860. Mayor of Portsmouth, Scioto County, Ohio from 1865 to 1867.
